biography_text: WOMACK, Steve, a Representative from Arkansas; born in Russellville, Pope County, Ark., on February 18, 1957; graduated from Russellville High School, Russellville, Ark., 1975; B.A., Arkansas Tech University, Russellville, Ark., 1979; Arkansas Army National Guard, 1979-2009; radio station manager; consultant; member of the Rogers, Ark., city council, 1983-1984 and 1997-1998; Mayor of Rogers, Ark., 1999-2010; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the three succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2011-present).
